verbose_text: Overall statistical comparisons by one-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni 's post-hoc tests and these results indicated that MMI-0100 inhibited the microglia activation and reduced the inflammatory factors in LPS- or Abeta 1-42 -induced AD model mice.
evidence: MMI-0100 inhibited the microglia activation and reduced the inflammatory factors in LPS- or Abeta 1-42
